definitions.definition: The formal robes of a priest.
A URL presented in canonical form.
Present in a canon, religious or otherwise.
According to recognised or orthodox rules.
definitions.example: The men played golf in the most canonical way, with no local rules.

definitions.definition: Stated or used in the most basic and straightforwardly applicable manner.
definitions.example: the reduction of a linear substitution to its canonical form

definitions.definition: In the form of a canon.
Of or pertaining to an ecclesiastical chapter
Distinguished among entities of its kind, so that it can be picked out in a way that does not depend on any arbitrary choices.
